replies.bodyText: You've already done *ngIf="manageUser$ | async as manageUsers", which is the same as *ngIf="manageUsers" here
replies.author: nikklassen

timeline.bodyText: nit: you don't need to write tests to check that things aren't initialized.
timeline.author: nikklassen

timeline.bodyText: Why not expect(manageUser).toEqual(expectedManageUsers)? You may as well check all the properties
